prompt_base: raw photo, realistic portrait of a powerful weathered warrior, (deep reddish-brown tanned skin:1.2), spiky black hair, fierce intense gaze, 8k professional photo
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, visible pores, subtle scars, sweat beads, realistic muscle definition, (natural skin subsurface scattering:1.2), detailed fabric weave on black gi, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, 3d render, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, friendly, bright neon red, saturated pink
